snippet: Tuesday’s rain-shortened game against the Cubs will resume Thursday after baseball cited a problem with the tarp at Wrigley Field.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Pittsburgh Pirates beat Atlanta Braves, 3-2; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Tuesday’s rain-shortened game against the Cubs will resume Thursday after baseball cited a problem with the tarp at Wrigley Field.

headline.main: A Dropped Fly Ball in the Ninth Helps the Pirates End a Long Skid
headline.print_headline: A Dropped Fly Ball in the Ninth Helps the Pirates End a Long Skid
